attributes.action: Tell Charles Dunstone to keep Jobs in the Country and in the North
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
TalkTalk have decided to move all retention jobs from the north west to split them between Northampton and South Africa. 
They have decided to do this just before christmas at which time we will nt have a job! 

They should be forced to keep jobs in the country at lease
